snippet.title: Lemuria: Lost in Space Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Lemuria: Lost in Space is a unique combination of point 'n click adventure, RPG and survival game.

* Add the game to your Steam wishlist: http://store.steampowered.com//app/563250

* Read more on our website: http://ejr.com.pl

* Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Lemuria-Lost-in-Space-553170998203330/

* Check out our Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lemuria7EXP
